title: Was there a World War II prisoner of war (POW) camp located at the south east corner of the intersection of the Carolina Beach Road and Shipyard Boulevard?  As a very young child in the late 1940s, I have a vague recollection of seeing such a facility.  I recall asking my father about it and he said German prisoners were there.
text:
This previous link at MyReporter.com should answer your question:
http://www.myreporter.com/?p=5394
